item.title: CVE-2024-21775|2024-02-16T14:35:11.451Z -- ManageEngine -- Exchange Reporter Plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine Exchange Reporter Plus versions 5714 and below are vulnerable to the Authenticated SQL injection in report exporting feature.
